meanings.definition: To host an event or show together with another person.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy cohosting cooking classes with my friend.
meanings.sent2: They will be cohosting the podcast next week.
meanings.sent3: The two clowns were cohosting a circus, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The birds cohosting the morning chorus sang in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: Cohosting the talent show made her feel confident and happy.

meanings.definition: The act of sharing hosting duties with someone else.
meanings.sent1: Her cohosting of the event was well-received by the audience.
meanings.sent2: The cohosting arrangement worked out smoothly for both parties.
meanings.sent3: The cohosting of the party turned into a fun competition.
meanings.sent4: Their cohosting was like a synchronized dance, seamless and graceful.
meanings.sent5: The cohosting responsibilities were divided equally among the team members.
